item.title: Icons
item.description: The icons that Faaviator uses are from an open-source and versatile icon pack called Iconoir Use CustomIconView(.iconoir(.icon), size: size, color: .color) CustomIconView(.system(.icon), ...

item.title: Button
item.description: Interactive backbone element of any application. Used for navigation, actions, and confirmations. SwiftUI .

item.title: Welcome to FAAVIATOR Design System
item.description: This is where all components, design conventions, and assets are documented. For the first version of this doc, I want to document out purely the SwiftUI components/styles Table of Contents.
